aboutMe.passion: Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Yuri Almeida, and I'm a self-taught Full Stack Developer living in Toronto. I'm passionate by the full range of web development, but particularly fascinated by the Backend. I relish a good challenge and approach them with positivity and focus. Let's get in touch!
